msbt.message: This place gets me so pumped! The breeze, the crashing waves, nature all around us It's all awesome!I just wanna jog laps around the island and catch bugs and fish and lift and lift and lift, !
I was kinda hoping life on the island would be more of a survivalist challenge thing, .Like, I thought there'd bebig, scary dinosaurs and exploding volcanoes and typhoons every other Tuesday
I never thought I'd meet someone even half as awesome as I am, but here you are, !I am SOOO pumped we live on the same island. Our co-op muscle workouts are gonna be legendary!
